post:
# About us

Misaka Network LLC is a Wyoming registered LLC (Filling ID 2017-000756675).

We are a RIPE NCC LIR member and also run our own network AS57695.

# Features

- SolusVM Powered
- Native IPv6 (Not available in IAD now)
- BGP Session Available (Not available in KHV)
- 3 day Money Back Guarantee
- Full root access

# Offers
## US-IAD-SAS1024-LET $7/mo

- CPU **1 vCPU (E3-1230 v5)**
- RAM **1G DDR4**
- Storage **10G SAS (HW RAID 1)**
- Bandwidth **1T (Outbound only)**
- Uplink **2 \* 1Gbps**
- IPv4 **1 \* /32**
- IPv6 (will be provided later after set up by upstream)
- BGP Session **+ 15 USD Setup Fee**

Looking Glass: [http://us-iad01.lg.zeptovm.com/](http://us-iad01.lg.zeptovm.com/)

Test IPv4: 199.119.65.5

Datacenter: i3d Washington (CoreSite VA1)

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)

## RU-LED-SSD1024-LET $7/mo

- CPU **1 vCPU (E5-2630 v4)**
- RAM **1G DDR4**
- Storage **10G SSD (HW RAID 1)**
- Bandwidth **1T (Inbound + Outbound)**
- Uplink **2 \* 10Gbps**
- IPv4 **1 \* /32**
- IPv6 **1 \* /128**
- BGP Session **+ 15 USD Setup Fee**

Looking Glass: [http://ru-led01.lg.zeptovm.com/](http://ru-led01.lg.zeptovm.com/)

Test IPv4: 199.119.65.5

Test IPv6: 2a0b:4342:2000:1::1

Datacenter: Selectel (St. Petersburg, Selectel SPB3)

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=26)


## RU-KHV-SSD768-LET $7/mo

- CPU **1 vCPU (E3)**
- RAM **768MB DDR4**
- Storage **8GB SSD (HW RAID 1)**
- Bandwidth **700GB (In + Out)**
- Uplink **2 \* 1Gbps**
- IPv4 **1 \* /32**
- IPv6 **1 \* /128**
- BGP Session **Not available in this datacenter**

Test IPv4: 92.223.60.1

Test IPv6: 2a03:90c0:a4::1

Datacenter: G-Core Labs (Redcom Khabarovsk)

[Purchase](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=24)

Higher plans can be found [here](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/)
